name: R n R - Reset and Restart
name_original: R n R - Reset and Restart
description:
A platformer where you can change the platform states. You can do a reset cycle as many times as you want. At any stage, you will be able to get a glimpse of what is coming in the next reset.

Use A and D to move left-right. 

SPACE to jump

Enter to Reset.

R to restart.
